ProjectTitle: Olefin functionalisation with CO2 via in situ reduction through  concerted action of homogeneous and zeolite catalysts
InitialFeedbackHistory:
04/07/2022
6. Preservation: please note the KU Leuven RDM policy recommends 10 year of preservation (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/policy); storing data on a hard drive only is risky, can you use KU Leuven servers? See https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/nl or contact your local IT team for more information. 
7. Sharing: you can also consider using a repository for sharing. If there are no suitable domain specific repositories in your field you can use KU Leuven RDR (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr), RDR gives your data a DOI and adds metadata which makes it more findable and citable.
label: good with suggestions
